static Scene com.stereoviewer.SceneLoader.loadScene ( String  path  )  throws Exception [static]

Parses the xlm file at the path parameter using the dom api and creates a scene object from the xlm file and returns it, also sets up lights and lighting appropriately

Parameters:
path the path to the scene file to be loaded
Exceptions:
Exception
